Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 3/31/2013, off Rob Wooten (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2013, off Josh Sullivan (COL)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2013, hitting .378 with 4 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Los Angeles (N) on 8/22/2013...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,764,286 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 8/9/2015...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Washington on 9/26/2015...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,685,714 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,685,714 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/18/2017 with a Broken Ankle, out for 8 weeks...
8/18/2017: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $2,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2019, hitting .393 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2020, hitting .452 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/14/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $11,670,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2022, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 6/21/2022 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from Minnesota to Baltimore on 1/31/2024 (Going to MIN: SS Manny Machado. Going to BAL: 2B Frank Woodward, P Antonio Quiros, LF Freddie Freeman, P Daniel Nellis)...
8/1/2024: Signed a contract extension with Baltimore, $2,830,000 per year, for 2 years.
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 10/16/2025...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/13/2026, off Osvaldo Benero (NYY)...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/5/2027 to a 2-year deal worth $3,710,000 per year...
